item.title: CVE-2024-3611|2024-05-22T05:32:47.483Z -- daveshine -- Toolbar Extras for Elementor & More – WordPress Admin Bar Enhanced
item.description: The Toolbar Extras for Elementor & More – WordPress Admin Bar Enhanced plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the plugin's 'tbex-version' shortcode in all versions up to, and including, 1.4.9 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
